about.title: About Me
about.description: I am Draxon (DraxonV1), a Minecraft mod developer and content creator focused on Fabric API development and building clean, efficient gameplay enhancements for modern Minecraft.
about.journeyTitle: My Journey as a Minecraft Mod Developer
journeyText: I began my Minecraft modding journey with a strong interest in improving gameplay quality and accessibility through code. What started as small experiments quickly turned into structured Fabric mods.
I focus on Fabric API development for Minecraft 1.21+, prioritizing clean architecture, performance awareness, and compatibility with other mods and modpacks.
Alongside mod development, I share learning resources, texture pack reviews, and development insights through YouTube to help others get started with Minecraft modding.

mods.title: Minecraft Mods & Projects
mods.description: Explore my growing collection of Minecraft Fabric mods available on CurseForge and Modrinth. These projects focus on utilities, debugging tools, and quality-of-life improvements for modern Minecraft.
